metadata.name: goto_frame_swf_3
metadata.description: Tests ActionGotoFrame opcode (0x81) - jumps to specified frame and stops playback. Implements complete gotoAndStop semantics with frame boundary validation, timeline navigation, and stop/play state management.
missing_features: Display list updates on frame change (graphics-only feature, requires SDL3/Vulkan rendering)
metadata.implementation_notes: The opcode is fully implemented with all core features: frame boundary validation (checks if target frame < total frames), timeline jump semantics (sets next_frame and manual_next_frame), stop/play state management (sets is_playing = 0 for gotoAndStop behavior), and integration with the MovieClip timeline system. Display list updates are automatic in graphics mode but not applicable in NO_GRAPHICS mode.
